item.title: Preparing for Netrunner Nationals Tournament Australia 2018
item.description: It’s a very exciting time for Australian Netrunner players this week - the Netrunner Nationals tournament for 2018 in Australia is on this weekend in Melbourne! Around this time, folks are flying in from all corners of the country to participate in what will be the last ever official Australian Nationals tournament, scheduled on Saturday, 13 October. There are two factors of note that should make this a particularly interesting tournament.
